lesson.title: Designing for Growth and Scale
lesson.summary: Scalability patterns provide proven approaches to handle increasing load through horizontal scaling, vertical scaling, and architectural improvements.
lesson.real_world_example: WhatsApp handles 100 billion messages per day using horizontal scaling with minimal servers through efficient architecture design
